title: 39 Undeniably Luxurious Gifts for Women Who Appreciate the Finer Things
description: From a Kendall Jenner-approved Tory Burch perfume to a pair of fancy Prada socks.
excerpt: Looking to gift something special to the women in your life? There are several luxury gifts for her at every price point. Read on for the best finds of 2024.
text: Tory Burch Sublime Eau de ParfumHere’s a magical scent that has mastered the art of mixing floral notes in a fresh way. Rose and magnolia combine with the hypnotizing smell of osmanthus at the heart of this perfume, making it a universally flattering gift for anyone. And do you see that gorgeous case? There’s no need for gift wrapping with packaging this divine.KitchenAid Design Series Evergreen Stand MixerIf she has dreams of getting her Nara Smith on, this limited-edition version of KitchenAid’s tried-and-true mixer will inspire her to bring all of those saved Pinterest recipes to life. In addition to the walnut bowl and green mixing stand, this special present comes with a wire whip, dough hook, and flat beater to make holiday baking easier than ever.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowCoach Tabby Bag CharmWhether she’s attaching this to her keys or if she’s lucky enough to have Coach’s most coveted bag to attach it to, this charm is proof that good things come in small packages. If gold feels like too much, this one also comes in a sophisticated silver.Chanel Chance Perfumed Hand CreamsHere’s a gift that’s both luxurious and useful. During the winter, help her skin stay hydrated with Chanel’s magical little hand creams. This set comes with three pastel-colored tubes, so she can keep one ready to go in each purse.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowGucci GG Shadow Silk ScarfIf she’s hard to please, take your gift-giving skills to new heights with an elegant scarf. Gucci’s design is made from 100 percent silk and comes with an enchanting floral print that’s emblazoned with the brand’s name.Prada Women’s Velvet Hair Clip - BlackOut of all of the luxury hair accessories, I’d bet Prada’s offerings top her list. And with the ever-increasing popularity of bows, this velvet one with the iconic triangle logo is a dream come true in any collection.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowEF Collection 14k Diamond & Malachite Stud EarringsGive her something that she can cherish forever—like a sparkling pair of earrings. This diamond-trimmed malachite stud is the festive party starter that’s missing in her assortment.Altuzarra Barnum WoolThere’s nothing as synonymous with the season as a Fair Isle sweater. Altuzarra is the brand behind this season’s editor-approved design, thanks to a luxurious blend of alpaca wool and cashmere yarn.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowChanel N°5 1.7 fl. oz. Eau de Parfum Body Oil SetWhen in doubt, stick to the classics. Chanel’s signature fragrance will forever be a crowd-pleaser. This set includes the perfume as well as the exquisite body oil, so she can double the fragrance’s impact and get the look (and feel) of super hydrated skin.Saint Laurent Le 5 à 7 Bea Suede Tote BagIs it possible for a handbag to be trendy and classic at the same time? Yes. Case in point: this Saint Laurent tote. The timeless silhouette is something she can carry to the office or through the airport. Plus, the brown suede material checks the trendy box.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowFlamingo Estate The Mini Garden TourWhen it comes to high-quality gifts for every woman on your list, bookmark Flamingo Estate. This set comes with a little bit of everything, from the slowly harvested olive oil to the soap created with sustainable botanicals.Santa Maria Novella Firenze 1221 Edition Rosa Gardenia Eau De CologneWhen it comes to sophisticated scents, Santa Maria Novella tops the list. Its Firenze 1221 edition of Rosa Gardenia combines all of the intoxicating scents you’d find in a dream nursery—like gardenia, rose, fig, and jasmine.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowLunya Airy Cotton & Silk Curved Hem PajamasThere’s nothing better than taking a shower and then slipping into a luxe pair of pajamas. With this gift, she’ll have you to thank for the best sleep ever.Hermès Rouge Lip Balm and Rose Kola Duo Lip Gift SetWhat could be better than an Hermès lippie? Two. This set comes with a nourishing balm and enhancers that add a touch of color and radiant shine.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowLongchamp Le Pliage Cosmetics CaseHere’s a bag that was originally designed to hold cosmetics while traveling, but it turned out to be the must-have mini bag for holding everyday essentials.Alessandra Rich Heart Crystal-Embellished Clip-On EarringsFestive jewelry will show your love for her, especially these heart-shaped earrings that are topped off with a sparkling bow.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowLa DoubleJ Dessert Plate Set of 6For those gracious hosts, a set of six La DoubleJ plates are guaranteed to bring joy this holiday season. Each unique dish is hand-painted and trimmed in 18kt gold.Apple Watch SE SmartwatchWhether she’s training for a marathon or is simply a tech titan, an Apple Watch is the perfect gift to give to help her track her fitness goals, messages, and so much more.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowPrada Cotton SocksThere’s a myth that those on the naughty list get socks. And, well, being naughty isn’t so bad, especially if it gets you a pair of cozy plaid Prada socks, right?Miu Miu Canvas and Leather DiaryIt’s important to have a place to write down all of her goals and thoughts. Miu Miu makes the journaling process extra special with this leather-trimmed notebook.Alexis Bennett Parker is the Commerce Content Lead at ELLE.com. In this newly created role, she oversees all shopping-related stories online, from fashion-forward trend pieces to the most coveted beauty buys on the market right now. Alexis has worked in the publishing space for 11 years, and seven of those years have been dedicated to helping shoppers make informed purchases—no buyer’s remorse here! Before joining the team at ELLE.com, she worked in the editorial departments of Vogue, Cosmopolitan, and InStyle, to name a few magazines. Not only has Alexis worked closely with several brands and tested hundreds of products over the course of her career, but she’s also won awards for her work as a shopping journalist. Namely, she was an honoree at the Pynk Magazine Gala in 2023, received the Condé Nast Commerce Content Award for Best Article by a New Hire in 2021, and was included on the Top 40 Under 40 Heir’s List in 2018.
html:
Tory Burch Sublime Eau de Parfum

Here’s a magical scent that has mastered the art of mixing floral notes in a fresh way. Rose and magnolia combine with the hypnotizing smell of osmanthus at the heart of this perfume, making it a universally flattering gift for anyone. And do you see that gorgeous case? There’s no need for gift wrapping with packaging this divine.

KitchenAid Design Series Evergreen Stand Mixer

If she has dreams of getting her Nara Smith on, this limited-edition version of KitchenAid’s tried-and-true mixer will inspire her to bring all of those saved Pinterest recipes to life. In addition to the walnut bowl and green mixing stand, this special present comes with a wire whip, dough hook, and flat beater to make holiday baking easier than ever.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Coach Tabby Bag Charm

Whether she’s attaching this to her keys or if she’s lucky enough to have Coach’s most coveted bag to attach it to, this charm is proof that good things come in small packages. If gold feels like too much, this one also comes in a sophisticated silver.

Chanel Chance Perfumed Hand Creams

Here’s a gift that’s both luxurious and useful. During the winter, help her skin stay hydrated with Chanel’s magical little hand creams. This set comes with three pastel-colored tubes, so she can keep one ready to go in each purse.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Gucci GG Shadow Silk Scarf

If she’s hard to please, take your gift-giving skills to new heights with an elegant scarf. Gucci’s design is made from 100 percent silk and comes with an enchanting floral print that’s emblazoned with the brand’s name.

Prada Women’s Velvet Hair Clip - Black

Out of all of the luxury hair accessories, I’d bet Prada’s offerings top her list. And with the ever-increasing popularity of bows, this velvet one with the iconic triangle logo is a dream come true in any collection.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

EF Collection 14k Diamond & Malachite Stud Earrings

Give her something that she can cherish forever—like a sparkling pair of earrings. This diamond-trimmed malachite stud is the festive party starter that’s missing in her assortment.

Altuzarra Barnum Wool

There’s nothing as synonymous with the season as a Fair Isle sweater. Altuzarra is the brand behind this season’s editor-approved design, thanks to a luxurious blend of alpaca wool and cashmere yarn.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Chanel N°5 1.7 fl. oz. Eau de Parfum Body Oil Set

When in doubt, stick to the classics. Chanel’s signature fragrance will forever be a crowd-pleaser. This set includes the perfume as well as the exquisite body oil, so she can double the fragrance’s impact and get the look (and feel) of super hydrated skin.

Saint Laurent Le 5 à 7 Bea Suede Tote Bag

Is it possible for a handbag to be trendy and classic at the same time? Yes. Case in point: this Saint Laurent tote. The timeless silhouette is something she can carry to the office or through the airport. Plus, the brown suede material checks the trendy box.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Flamingo Estate The Mini Garden Tour

When it comes to high-quality gifts for every woman on your list, bookmark Flamingo Estate. This set comes with a little bit of everything, from the slowly harvested olive oil to the soap created with sustainable botanicals.

Santa Maria Novella Firenze 1221 Edition Rosa Gardenia Eau De Cologne

When it comes to sophisticated scents, Santa Maria Novella tops the list. Its Firenze 1221 edition of Rosa Gardenia combines all of the intoxicating scents you’d find in a dream nursery—like gardenia, rose, fig, and jasmine.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Lunya Airy Cotton & Silk Curved Hem Pajamas

There’s nothing better than taking a shower and then slipping into a luxe pair of pajamas. With this gift, she’ll have you to thank for the best sleep ever.

Hermès Rouge Lip Balm and Rose Kola Duo Lip Gift Set

What could be better than an Hermès lippie? Two. This set comes with a nourishing balm and enhancers that add a touch of color and radiant shine.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Longchamp Le Pliage Cosmetics Case

Here’s a bag that was originally designed to hold cosmetics while traveling, but it turned out to be the must-have mini bag for holding everyday essentials.

Alessandra Rich Heart Crystal-Embellished Clip-On Earrings

Festive jewelry will show your love for her, especially these heart-shaped earrings that are topped off with a sparkling bow.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

La DoubleJ Dessert Plate Set of 6

For those gracious hosts, a set of six La DoubleJ plates are guaranteed to bring joy this holiday season. Each unique dish is hand-painted and trimmed in 18kt gold.

Apple Watch SE Smartwatch

Whether she’s training for a marathon or is simply a tech titan, an Apple Watch is the perfect gift to give to help her track her fitness goals, messages, and so much more.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Prada Cotton Socks

There’s a myth that those on the naughty list get socks. And, well, being naughty isn’t so bad, especially if it gets you a pair of cozy plaid Prada socks, right?

Miu Miu Canvas and Leather Diary

It’s important to have a place to write down all of her goals and thoughts. Miu Miu makes the journaling process extra special with this leather-trimmed notebook.

Alexis Bennett Parker is the Commerce Content Lead at ELLE.com. In this newly created role, she oversees all shopping-related stories online, from fashion-forward trend pieces to the most coveted beauty buys on the market right now. Alexis has worked in the publishing space for 11 years, and seven of those years have been dedicated to helping shoppers make informed purchases—no buyer’s remorse here! Before joining the team at ELLE.com, she worked in the editorial departments of Vogue, Cosmopolitan, and InStyle, to name a few magazines. Not only has Alexis worked closely with several brands and tested hundreds of products over the course of her career, but she’s also won awards for her work as a shopping journalist. Namely, she was an honoree at the Pynk Magazine Gala in 2023, received the Condé Nast Commerce Content Award for Best Article by a New Hire in 2021, and was included on the Top 40 Under 40 Heir’s List in 2018.
